TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionListCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的智能标记面板中的所有项的聚合。The class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel. 类包含零个或多对象。The class contains zero or more objects. 每个列表包含零个或多个对象，表示在面板中的实际项，并从派生类。Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the class. 下表显示提供这两种技术来填充的组件，包括自定义控件的项的面板。The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls. |技术Technique|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |拉取模型Pull model|组件类，该类派生自的设计器类中，提供通过此集合属性。The designer for the component class, which is derived from the class, supplies this collection through the property. 在它必须显示面板时，设计器基础结构将读取此属性。The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |推送模型Push model|A或作为中调用的参数提供方法与组件关联。A or is supplied as a parameter in a call to the method of the associated with the component.| 设计器基础结构通过创建智能标记面板，其构造函数采用两个参数的类型构造一个面板。The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type . 列表，其中包含提取和推送项目，集合将合并成一个面板。The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel. 由于派生自类，使用内部来存储其集合对象。Because it derives from the class, uses an internal to store its collection of objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的集合对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 有关完整示例，请参阅[如何： 将智能标记将附加到 Windows 窗体组件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法引发了异常复制时，目标数组的状态为未定义。If the method throws an exception while copying, the state of the destination array is undefined. 例如，如果或发生，目标数组可能处于部分填充的状态。For example, if an or occurs, the destination array may be left in a partially filled state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`参数等于的值属性，则新元素添加到集合的末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the value of the property, the new element is added to the end of the collection. 在内部，类使用以包含它的集合对象。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 由于列表维护由连续的元素，在插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。Because lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 这种调整将更改插入点之后的元素的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the insertion point.

exception.span: is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在内部，类使用以包含它的集合对象。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 由于列表维护由连续的元素，移除点之后的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。Since lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the removal point move up to occupy the vacated spot. 这种调整移除点之后的元素的索引，更改。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the removal point.
